articles.title: Ukrainian nuclear plant near fighting is cut off from power grid - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The Zaporizhzhia plant operator said the cut-off meant two remaining reactors at Europe’s biggest nuclear power plant were disconnected from the grid.
articles.content:
UKRAINES NUCLEAR POWER operator has said the Zaporizhzhia plant has been cut off from the electricity grid for the first time after fires damaged the last remaining transmission line.
